name: Hike Framework
body:
### Welcome
Welcome to the Hike Framework project.
The aim of this project is to provide an easy to use 2D Game Engine Framework for Windows Universal App Platform using the C# programming language.

It will use Win2d for graphics to boost the development but keeping in mind an easy way to extend for other libraries like SharpDX or OpenTK. 

### Projects
For testing, I will use a recent Game Jam prototype and improve it on top of this new framework.
Raw project can be found at https://github.com/xesf/gamejam201601
